categories: Category:The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark

nodes.text: "Bug" is a short story that was published in the anthology The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark, based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Massacre." It was written by E. Anne Convery, and published on August 25, 2020 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press. It is the only original story in the anthology and focuses on Bug.
